_comment: Configuration for API-based data sources (Tier 1 + Tier 4)

vulncheck_kev.description: Known Exploited Vulnerabilities from VulnCheck (3700+ CVEs)
vulncheck_kev.note: To enable: Get free API token from https://vulncheck.com/ and set VULNCHECK_API_TOKEN environment variable

fairfax_calendar.description: Fairfax County Board and FCPS meetings

event_monitor.description: Concert and live music events (DISABLED: Bandsintown API requires authentication)
event_monitor.note: To enable: Get API key from https://www.bandsintown.com/api_requests/new and update collector code

usajobs.description: Federal job postings via USAJobs API (DISABLED: Requires API key)
usajobs.note: To enable: Get API key from https://developer.usajobs.gov/APIRequest/Index and set USAJOBS_API_KEY and USAJOBS_EMAIL environment variables

token_allocation._comment: Target token usage for each collector type in Claude context
